silver.name: Team Building
silver.desc:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 5 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

silver.name: Band of Thieves I
silver.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

silver.name: Caretaker's Ally
silver.desc: Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

silver.name: Beggars Can Be Choosers
silver.desc: You get +3 Augment rerolls for all other augment choices. Gain 7 gold.

silver.name: Lunch Money
silver.desc: Every 8 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.

silver.name: Branching Out
silver.desc:
Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

silver.name: Called Shot
silver.desc: Set your win streak to +4. Gain 4 gold.

silver.name: Rolling For Days I
silver.desc: Gain 11 free Shop rerolls.

silver.name: Component Buffet
silver.desc:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

silver.name: Spoils of War I
silver.desc: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

silver.name: Find Your Center
silver.desc: Your champion that starts combat in the center of the front row gains 15% Damage Amp and 15% max Health.

silver.name: Fine Vintage
silver.desc: Completed items left on your bench for 4 rounds transform into Support Anvils.

silver.name: Good For Something I
silver.desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% to drop 1 gold on death.

silver.name: Delayed Start
silver.desc: Sell your board and bench. Gain 4 random 2-star 1 cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds.

silver.name: Iron Assets
silver.desc:
Gain a component anvil and 4 gold.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

silver.name: Item Collector I
silver.desc: Your team gains 10 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 2 Health, 1 Attack Damage, and 1 Ability Power.

silver.name: Item Grab Bag I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

silver.name: Lategame Specialist
silver.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.

silver.name: Latent Forge
silver.desc:
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

silver.name: Mentorship I
silver.desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 12% Attack Speed and 120 Health.

silver.name: Missed Connections
silver.desc: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

silver.name: One, Two, Five!
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

silver.name: Ones Twos Three
silver.desc: Gain 2 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

silver.name: Over Encumbered
silver.desc: For the next stage, you only get 1 bench slot. After, get 3 item components.

silver.name: Pandora's Bench
silver.desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

silver.name: Pandora's Items
silver.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random component.

silver.name: Patience is a Virtue
silver.desc: Each round, gain 2 free rerolls if you did not buy a champion last round.

silver.name: Placebo
silver.desc: Gain 8 gold. Your team gains 1% Attack Speed.

silver.name: Placebo+
silver.desc: Gain 15 gold. Your team gains 1% Attack Speed.

silver.name: Pumping Up I
silver.desc: Your team gains 6% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more.

silver.name: Recombobulator
silver.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

silver.name: Blistering Strikes
silver.desc: Your team's attacks Burn their targets for 5% of their max Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

silver.name: Restart Mission
silver.desc: Remove all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs, 3 2-star 2-costs, and 1 2-star 1-cost champion.

silver.name: Risky Moves
silver.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

silver.name: Silver Spoon
silver.desc: Gain 10 XP.

silver.name: Teaming Up I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

silver.name: Young and Wild and Free
silver.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 5 gold.

silver.name: Backup
silver.desc: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed if at least 4 allies start combat in the back two rows.

silver.name: Blade Dance
silver.desc: Gain an Irelia. Your strongest Irelia gains 60% Attack Speed and gains a brand new Ability that dashes her between two targets, dealing physical damage to both.

silver.name: Bulky Buddies I
silver.desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain 100 Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a 10% max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

silver.name: Climb The Ladder I
silver.desc: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain 3 Ability Power, 3% Attack Damage, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

silver.name: Combat Medic
silver.desc: Gain a Steb. Your strongest Steb's Ability's Mana cost is reduced by 10, but no longer heals. Steb's spell grants 30% Omnivamp and strikes 3 times, each dealing 65%.

silver.name: Corrosion
silver.desc: Enemy champions in the first two rows lose 3 Armor and Magic Resist every 2 seconds.

silver.name: Crafted Crafting
silver.desc: Whenever you craft a completed item, gain 2 rerolls.

silver.name: Diversified Portfolio
silver.desc:
Each round, gain 1 gold for every 3 non-unique traits active.
Gain 1 gold.

silver.name: Diversified Portfolio+
silver.desc:
Each round, gain 1 gold for every 3 non-unique traits active.
Gain 4 gold.

silver.name: Dummify
silver.desc: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Training Dummy with 100% of their combined health. The dummy gains 1000 Health per stage.

silver.name: Eye For An Eye
silver.desc: For every 15 ally champions that die, gain a random component (max 4).

silver.name: Eye For An Eye+
silver.desc: Gain a random component. For every 16 ally champions that die, gain another component (max 3).

silver.name: Firesale
silver.desc: Each round, steal a random 3-cost or lower champion from the shop. Gain 1 gold.

silver.name: Glass Cannon I
silver.desc: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at 90% health but gain 15% Damage Amp.

silver.name: Health is Wealth I
silver.desc: Your team gains 10% Omnivamp. Get a bonus of 8 gold when your team first accumulates 10000 total champion healing.

silver.name: This Will Work
silver.desc: Gain a Powder. Your strongest Powder's explosion radius is increased by 5 hexes, Increases damage dealt.

silver.name: Kingslayer
silver.desc: After winning player combat, gain 1 gold. If they had more health than you, gain 6 Gold instead. Gain 1 gold now.

silver.name: Lineup
silver.desc: Your team gains 2.5 Armor and Magic Resist for each unit that starts combat in the front two rows.

silver.name: Mad Chemist
silver.desc:
Gain a Singed. Your strongest Singed cannot attack but constantly runs, leaving a poison trail dealing magic damage over time. His Ability will always target himself and instead grants 30% Omnivamp and Move Speed.
Magic Damage: 140% / 210% / 315% / 420%

silver.name: Manaflow I
silver.desc: Your units that start combat in the back row gain 2 additional Mana per attack.

silver.name: One For All I
silver.desc: Your team gains 2% max Health and 1.5% Damage Amp for each unique one-cost champion on your board. Gain 2 one-costs.

silver.name: Power Up
silver.desc: Your next augment is one tier higher.

silver.name: Reroll Transfer
silver.desc:
For every 1 unused Augment Reroll, gain 3 free shop rerolls. Gain 3 gold.

Does not include the round this augment is selected.

silver.name: Rigged Shop
silver.desc: Your next shop and every 4 shops will contain all 3-cost champions.

silver.name: Rigged Shop+
silver.desc: Your next shop and every 4 shops will contain all 3-cost champions. Gain 9 rerolls.

silver.name: Superstars I
silver.desc: Your team deals 5% more damage, increased by 2% for every 3-star champion on your team. Gain 2 rerolls.

silver.name: Support Mining
silver.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies 7 times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.

silver.name: Support Mining+
silver.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies 5 times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.

silver.name: Survivor
silver.desc: After 3 players are eliminated, gain 92 gold.

silver.name: Table Scraps
silver.desc: After the next 3 carousels, gain one unit that was not taken and its item. Gain 1 gold.

silver.name: Titanic Titan
silver.desc: Increase your current and max player health by 25. On carousel rounds you are released earlier, but are much slower.

silver.name: Trolling
silver.desc: Gain a Trundle. Your strongest Trundle's Ability no longer heals, but grants him 140% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, and permanently grants him 1.5% Attack Damage. His maximum mana is reduced by 50.

gold.name: All That Shimmers
gold.desc: Choose a gold-generating Artifact items and gain a Magnetic Remover.

gold.name: All That Shimmers+
gold.desc: Choose a gold-generating Artifact. Gain a Magnetic Remover and 4 gold.

gold.name: Caretaker's Favor
gold.desc:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

gold.name: Big Grab Bag
gold.desc:
Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

gold.name: Category Five
gold.desc: Gain a Runaan's Hurricane. Your Runaan's Hurricanes shoot 1 extra bolts, each dealing 85% of the original damage.

gold.name: Clear Mind
gold.desc: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

gold.name: Clockwork Accelerator
gold.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed every 3 seconds in combat.

gold.name: Cluttered Mind
gold.desc: Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

gold.name: Crown Guarded
gold.desc: Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is 100% stronger and the shield lasts 5 seconds longer.

gold.name: Dragon's Spirit
gold.desc: Gain a Dragon's Claw. Champions equipped with a Dragon's Claw gain 100 Health and 10% Durability.

gold.name: Spoils of War II
gold.desc: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.

gold.name: Duo Queue
gold.desc: Gain 2 random 5-cost champions and 2 copies of a random component.

gold.name: Epoch
gold.desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 6 XP and 2 free rerolls.

gold.name: Epoch+
gold.desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 8 XP and 3 free rerolls.

gold.name: Heroic Grab Bag
gold.desc:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 9 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

gold.name: High Voltage
gold.desc: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +3 hex radius and do 25% more damage.

gold.name: Inspiring Epitaph
gold.desc: When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a 20% max Health Shield and 10% stacking Attack Speed.

gold.name: Item Collector II
gold.desc: Your team gains 20 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 5 Health, 1.5 Attack Damage, and 1.5 Ability Power.

gold.name: Patient Study
gold.desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

gold.name: Little Buddies
gold.desc: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 65 Health and 7% Attack Speed for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

gold.name: Long Distance Pals
gold.desc: Combat start: Your 2 units furthest from each other form a bond, sharing 22% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.

gold.name: Mentorship II
gold.desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 18% Attack Speed and 220 Health.

gold.name: Not Today
gold.desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Pandora's Items II
gold.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 2 random components.

gold.name: Pilfer
gold.desc: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat.

gold.name: Portable Forge
gold.desc:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

gold.name: Prizefighter
gold.desc: Gain 2 item components. Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

gold.name: Pumping Up II
gold.desc: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more.

gold.name: Raining Gold
gold.desc: Gain 8 gold now and 1 gold every round.

gold.name: Raining Gold+
gold.desc: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

gold.name: ReinFOURcement
gold.desc: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Get 12 gold.

gold.name: Replication
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

gold.name: Salvage Bin
gold.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

gold.name: Salvage Bin+
gold.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

gold.name: Scapegoat
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy and 4 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

gold.name: Scoreboard Scrapper
gold.desc: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the top 4, they have 10% more Health.

gold.name: Slammin'
gold.desc: Gain 1 random Component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

gold.name: Slammin'+
gold.desc: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

gold.name: Support Cache
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Support items.

gold.name: Teaming Up II
gold.desc: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.

gold.name: Thorn-Plated Armor
gold.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 5-100% more damage (based on Stage) and heal the holder for 50% of the damage dealt.

gold.name: Trade Sector
gold.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 4 gold.

gold.name: Built Different
gold.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-600 Health and 45-75% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

gold.name: Trait Tracker
gold.desc: The first time you activate 8 non-unique traits for 1 combat, gain 6 random emblems.

gold.name: Unleash The Beast
gold.desc: Gain a Sterak's Gage. When its effect triggers, the holder gains 35% Attack Speed for the rest of combat and immunity to crowd control for 5 seconds.

gold.name: Wandering Trainer I
gold.desc: Gain 1 gold and a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems.

gold.name: What Doesn't Kill You
gold.desc: Gain 2 gold after losing a player combat. Gain a random component after every 4 losses.

gold.name: Worth the Wait
gold.desc: Gain a random two-star 1-cost champion. After 2 rounds, gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

gold.name: A Golden Find
gold.desc: Champions evolved by the Anomaly drop 2 gold every 3 kills. Gain 10 free rerolls.

gold.name: A Magic Roll
gold.desc: Roll 3 dice. Gain rewards based on their total.

gold.name: Academic Research
gold.desc: Whenever you build an item, gain a completed item anvil instead. That anvil always offers an Academy item and the item built. Gain 1 random components. Gain a Lux and an Ezreal.

gold.name: Academy Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Academy Emblem and a Leona.

gold.name: Adrenaline Burst
gold.desc: Combat start and every 6 seconds, all Quickstrikers attack 85% faster for 2.5 seconds. Gain a Nocturne and Akali.

gold.name: Ambusher Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Ambusher Emblem and a Camille.

gold.name: Artillerist Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Artillerist Emblem and a Tristana.

gold.name: Automata Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Automata Emblem and a Nocturne.

gold.name: Bad Luck Protection
gold.desc: Your team can no longer critically strike. Convert each 1% Critical Strike Chance into 1% Attack Damage. Gain a Sparring Gloves.

gold.name: Black Rose Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Black Rose Emblem.

gold.name: Blazing Soul I
gold.desc: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains 20 Ability Power and 20% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every 3 seconds.

gold.name: BRB
gold.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 2 completed item anvils.

gold.name: Bronze For Life I
gold.desc: Your team gains 3% Damage Amp for each Bronze-tier trait.

gold.name: Bruiser Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Sett.

gold.name: Brutal Revenge
gold.desc: Gain 2 Rennis. Your strongest Renni's Ability costs 10 less and causes her to lunge towards the farthest enemy within 2 hexes, dealing 110% damage to the target and reduced damage to enemies in her path.

gold.name: Bulky Buddies II
gold.desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain 175 Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a 15% max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

gold.name: Climb The Ladder II
gold.desc: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain 6 Ability Power, 6% Attack Damage, 6 Armor, and 6 Magic Resist.

gold.name: Cloning Facility
gold.desc: Empower the hex in the center of the third row. Summon a clone of the champion in it with 80% base Health and 10% increased Mana cost.

gold.name: Conqueror Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Conqueror Emblem and a Rell.

gold.name: Cooking Pot
gold.desc: At the start of each turn, all units holding a Frying Pan or Spatula item grant the nearest champion 50 permanent Health. Gain a Frying Pan.

gold.name: Crimson Pact
gold.desc: Gain a Vladimir. Your strongest Vladimir gains +3 Range and gains 5 bonus Mana each attack. His Ability no longer heals but grants 10% Damage Amp, deals 80% bonus damage, and spreads additional damage to the nearest enemy.

gold.name: Crown's Will
gold.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 10 Ability Power and 10 Armor.

gold.name: Domination
gold.desc: Dominators gain 10% Attack Speed while shielded. When a Dominator gets a kill, all Dominators gain 100 Shield for 3 seconds. Gain a Cassiopeia.

gold.name: Dominator Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Dominator Emblem and a Blitzcrank.

gold.name: Enforcer Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Enforcer Emblem.

gold.name: Family Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Family Emblem.

gold.name: Firelight Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Firelight Emblem and a Zeri.

gold.name: Forbidden Magic
gold.desc: Every 2 takedowns by Black Rose champions or Sion grant Sion permanent 3% Attack Damage and 15 Max Health. Gain 3 Black Rose champions. (Stacks: )

gold.name: Forward Thinking
gold.desc: Lose all your gold. After 5 player combats, gain back the original amount and another 70 gold.

gold.name: Fractured Crystals
gold.desc: When an Automata champion fires their blast, they fire a second blast at the closest enemy dealing 70% of the original damage. Gain an Amumu and Nocturne.

gold.name: Glass Cannon II
gold.desc: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at 90% health but gain 25% Damage Amp.

gold.name: Gloves Off
gold.desc: Gain a Vander. Your strongest Vander gains a brand new Ability that no longer grants resistances, but deals 70% increased damage and punches the target backwards, dealing 35% of the original damage to all enemies hit.

gold.name: Gold For Dummies
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. Every 10 seconds, all Training Dummies grant 1 gold.

gold.name: Golemify
gold.desc: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Golem with 90% of their combined Health and 60% of their combined Attack Damage. The Golem gains 500 Health per stage.

gold.name: Aerial Warfare
gold.desc: Firelight champions gain 9% Attack Damage and 9 Ability Power when they start a Firelight dash. They gain another 3% for every hex traveled that combat. Gain a Scar and Zeri.

gold.name: Health is Wealth II
gold.desc: Your team gains 15% Omnivamp. Get a bonus of 15 gold when your team first accumulates 10000 total champion healing.

gold.name: Heavily Smash
gold.desc: Every 4 seconds, Bruisers deal 7% bonus max Health bonus physical damage on their next attack. Gain a Steb and a Trundle.

gold.name: Investment Strategy I
gold.desc: Your champions gain 8 permanent max health per interest you earn.

gold.name: Law Enforcement
gold.desc: Enforcer champions gain 10% Attack Damage. Every 6 Wanted enemy deaths grant 6 gold. Gain a Steb and Maddie.

gold.name: Loot Explosion
gold.desc: Ambusher kills have a chance to drop loot, scaling with Critical Strike Chance. The value of the loot given can also critically strike, granting even more loot. Gain a Camille and a Powder.

gold.name: Mace's Will
gold.desc: Gain a Sparring Gloves. Your team gains 8% Attack Speed and 20% Critical Strike Chance.

gold.name: Malicious Monetization
gold.desc: Gain 2 gold. For the next 3 rounds, enemy champions drop 2 gold when killed.

gold.name: Manaflow II
gold.desc: Your units that start combat in the back row gain 4 additional Mana per attack.

gold.name: Moonlight
gold.desc: Combat start: 1 random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 3-star for that round and gains 45% Attack Damage and 45 Ability Power.

gold.name: NO SCOUT NO PIVOT
gold.desc: Units can no longer be benched or sold after fighting in a player combat. After each player combat, units that fought gain 20 Health, 1.5% Attack Damage, and 1.5% Ability Power.

gold.name: Noble Sacrifice
gold.desc: When your first ally dies each combat, grant your team 25 + 10% of that ally's Armor and Magic Resistance.

gold.name: Noxian Guillotine
gold.desc: Conquerors execute enemies below 12% Health. When they do, they gain 5 Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat. Gain a Darius and Draven.

gold.name: One For All II
gold.desc: Your team gains 3% max Health and 2% Damage Amp for each unique one-cost champion on your board. Gain 3 one-costs.

gold.name: Overheal
gold.desc: Every third attack deals an additional 150% damage and heals 50% of the damage. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

gold.name: Paint the Town Blue
gold.desc: When the first 4 Rebels die each combat, summon a copy of themselves that is one-star lower with 400 less Health. Gain an Akali and an Irelia.

gold.name: Pair of Fours
gold.desc: If your team has exactly 2 four-cost champions, they each gain 404 Health and 24.4% Attack Speed. Gain a random 4-cost.

gold.name: Piercing Lotus I
gold.desc: Your team gains 5% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. Critical strikes 20% Shred and Sunder the target for 3 seconds.

gold.name: Pit Fighter Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Pit Fighter Emblem and an Urgot.

gold.name: Powered Shields
gold.desc: While Shielded, your units gain 10% Durability. The first time allies fall below 50% Health, they gain 100-225 Shield (based on Stage) for 3 seconds.

gold.name: Pyromaniac
gold.desc: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal 50% increased damage.

gold.name: Quickstriker Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Quickstriker Emblem and an Akali.

gold.name: Rebel Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Rebel Emblem and an Akali.

gold.name: Rocket Collection
gold.desc: Artillerist rockets deal 15% increased damage. Every 65 rockets your Artillerists fire, gain a Collector (max 2). Gain a Tristana and Urgot. (Rockets Fired: )

gold.name: Sated Spellweaver
gold.desc: After casting an Ability, champions gain 20% Omnivamp for 3 seconds. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

gold.name: Scavenger
gold.desc: The first 5 enemy champions that are killed each combat grant a champion on your team a temporary completed item.

gold.name: Scrap Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Scrap Emblem and a Ziggs.

gold.name: Sentinel Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Sentinel Emblem and a Rell.

gold.name: Shield Bash
gold.desc: Sentinels gain 5% bonus Armor and Magic Resist. Every 4 seconds, their next attack deals 75% of their total resistances as magic damage. Gain a Loris.

gold.name: Shop Glitch
gold.desc: During non-player combat rounds, your shop refreshes for free every 2.5 seconds for 30 seconds.

gold.name: Sniper Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem and a Zeri.

gold.name: Sniper's Nest
gold.desc: Snipers gain +8% Damage Amp for each round fought from the same starting hex (Maximum +32%). Gain a Zeri.

gold.name: Sorcerer Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem and a Vladimir.

gold.name: Spear's Will
gold.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Damage and 10 Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.

gold.name: Spirit Link
gold.desc: Your team restores 6% of their max Health every 4 seconds. Increase the healing by 0.5% for every 10 missing player Health.

gold.name: Starry Night
gold.desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain 6 gold.
Chances increase with player level.

gold.name: Starry Night+
gold.desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain 8 gold.
Chances increase with player level.

gold.name: Superstars II
gold.desc: Your team deals 7% more damage, increased by 4% for every 3-star champion on your team. Gain 4 rerolls.

gold.name: The Mutation Survives
gold.desc: Experiments gain 12% Health and grant a special hex. The Experiment in the hex is killed on combat start, granting their Experiment bonus to other laboratory hexes. Gain 3 Experiment champions.

gold.name: Tomb Raider I
gold.desc: For the next 3 players eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

gold.name: Top of the Scrap Heap
gold.desc: Every 6 components Scrap champions convert, gain a random component (max 5). Gain a Powder and a Trundle.

gold.name: Tower Defense
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy equipped with a random emblem that fires ranged attacks at enemies. It upgrades as the game goes on.

gold.name: Training Arc
gold.desc: Pit Fighters permanently gain 1.5% Attack Damage if they lost the last combat. If they won, gain 50 Health instead. Gain an Urgot.

gold.name: Trait: Martial Law
gold.desc:
When Ambessa casts, Caitlyn fires an empowered attack at the target, dealing 200% damage. Ambessa gains 18% of Caitlyn's Attack Damage.

Gain a Caitlyn and Ambessa.

gold.name: Trait: Menaces
gold.desc:
While fielded with Silco, Powder gains Dominator, but no longer benefits from Family. When her monkey explodes, it creates 3 of Silco's monstrosities.

Gain a 2-star Powder and a Silco.

gold.name: Trait: Reunion
gold.desc:
When Vi casts, Ekko releases 3 afterimages towards her target dealing 40% damage. When Ekko casts, Vi slams an earthquake towards his target dealing 100% damage.

Gain a Vi and Ekko.

gold.name: Trait: Sisters
gold.desc:
Gain the Sister Trait. When Vi scores a takedown, Jinx gains 80% bonus Attack Speed for 10 seconds. When Jinx scores a takedown, Vi gains 80% bonus Attack Damage for 10 seconds.

Gain a Vi and Jinx.

gold.name: Trait: Unlikely Duo
gold.desc:
Jinx and Sevika gain 10% Attack Damage and 100 Health. Whenever one casts, they grant the other 10 mana. Sevika's arm is luckier.

Gain a Jinx and Sevika.

gold.name: Trifecta I
gold.desc: Gain 2 3-cost champions. Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 250 Health and 23% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Two Much Value
gold.desc: Gain 1 reroll for every 2 unique two-cost champions fielded last combat. Gain 2 two-cost unit.

gold.name: Two Trick
gold.desc: Gain a random 2-star two-cost and 2 random 2-star one-cost champions.

gold.name: Vampiric Vitality
gold.desc: You heal for 20% of the damage you deal to enemy Tacticians. Your units gain 12% Omnivamp.

gold.name: Visionary Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Visionary Emblem and a Renata Glasc.

gold.name: Voidcaller
gold.desc:
For every 275 Mana Visionaries spend during combat, summon a Voidling, up to 5 Voidlings. Gain a Rell and Morgana.

The Voidling has 400-600 Health based on Stage.

gold.name: War for the Undercity
gold.desc: Everytime you choose to save your Shimmer on a Black Market, heal 4 player health and gain 6 gold. Gain a Renni.

gold.name: Warpath
gold.desc: After dealing 60 player damage, gain a chest of high cost champions and items.

gold.name: Watcher Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Watcher Emblem and a Vander.

gold.name: Welcome to the Playground
gold.desc: If at least 2 Family members are alive after 15 seconds in combat or at the end of combat, gain a random copy of a Vander, Powder, or Violet. Gain a Powder and Violet.

gold.name: Why Not Both?
gold.desc: While you field 2 of the same Form Swapper in different forms, both gain 30 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist, and 30% Attack Damage. When you 3-star a Form Swapper, gain a 2-star copy. Gain a Swain and Gangplank.

gold.name: Rocket Collection+
gold.desc: Artillerist rockets deal 15% increased damage. Every 65 rockets your Artillerists fire, gain a Collector (max 2). Gain a Tristana and Urgot. (Rockets Fired: )

gold.name: Trait: Betrayal
gold.desc:
Maddie always targets Ambessa's target with her Ability and attacks. Every round where either gets at least 2 kills, gain a Maddie.

Gain a 2-star Maddie and Ambessa.

gold.name: Experiment Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Experiment Emblem and an Urgot.

prismatic.name: Anger Issues
prismatic.desc: All your current and future completed items transform into Guinsoo's Rageblades that grant 45 Armor and Magic Resist. Every 2 Rageblade stacks grant 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

prismatic.name: At What Cost
prismatic.desc: Immediately go to level 6 and gain 4 XP. You don't get to choose your future augments.

prismatic.name: Caretaker's Chosen
prismatic.desc:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: component anvil
Level 6: completed item anvil
Level 7: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items

prismatic.name: Birthday Present
prismatic.desc: Gain a 2-star champion and 1 gold every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (max: 5-cost).

prismatic.name: Blinding Speed
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Giant Slayer, Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve Bow and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries!

prismatic.name: Build a Bud!
prismatic.desc: Gain a random 3-star 1-cost champion and 10 gold.

prismatic.name: Buried Treasures III
prismatic.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).

prismatic.name: Call to Chaos
prismatic.desc: Gain a powerful and random reward.

prismatic.name: Spoils of War III
prismatic.desc: Enemies have a 45% chance to drop loot when killed.

prismatic.name: Dual Purpose
prismatic.desc: The first time you buy XP each round, gain 2 gold. Whenever you buy XP, reroll your Shop.

prismatic.name: Flexible
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 random emblem. At the start of every Stage, gain a random emblem. Your team gains 40 Health for each emblem they are holding.

prismatic.name: Prismatic Ticket
prismatic.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 45% chance to gain a free reroll.

prismatic.name: Going Long
prismatic.desc:
You no longer gain interest. Gain 15 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

prismatic.name: Hard Commit
prismatic.desc: Gain a random emblem. Now and at the start of each stage, gain a 1-star champion of that trait with a cost equal to the Stage (max 5).

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund
prismatic.desc:
Gain 25 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

prismatic.name: Shopping Spree
prismatic.desc: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level+1. Gain 4 gold.

prismatic.name: Immovable Object
prismatic.desc: Gain a Randuin's Omen. Its range is increased by 1 hex and its effect is increased by 50%.

prismatic.name: I'm the Carry Now
prismatic.desc: Get a Golem with tailored offensive items. It gets stronger at the start of each Stage.

prismatic.name: Invested+
prismatic.desc: Gain 26 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

prismatic.name: Invested++
prismatic.desc: Gain 45 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

prismatic.name: Living Forge
prismatic.desc:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 9 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves. In 7 rounds, get another Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves+
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Level Up!
prismatic.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 12 immediately.

prismatic.name: Pandora's Items III
prismatic.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday
prismatic.desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday +
prismatic.desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

prismatic.name: Pumping Up III
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 16% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more.

prismatic.name: Radiant Refactor
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvil.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!

prismatic.name: Radiant Relics
prismatic.desc:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

prismatic.name: Roll The Dice
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

prismatic.name: Shimmerscale Essence
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

prismatic.name: Subscription Service
prismatic.desc: Now, and at the start of each Stage, open a Shop of 4 unique 4-cost champions and gain 8 gold.

prismatic.name: The Golden Egg
prismatic.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan+
prismatic.desc:
Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Gain 15 gold now.

prismatic.name: Upward Mobility
prismatic.desc: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 2 Health and 3 free rerolls whenever you level up.

prismatic.name: Wandering Trainer II
prismatic.desc: Gain 6 gold and a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached Emblems.

prismatic.name: Worth the Wait II
prismatic.desc: Gain a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

prismatic.name: Academy Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Academy Emblem and a random sponsored item.

prismatic.name: Ambusher Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Ambusher Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Camille.

prismatic.name: An Exalted Adventure
prismatic.desc: Gain three 2-cost champions. If you 3-star two of them, gain an orb filled with loot. Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator at the start of next 2 stages.

prismatic.name: Artillerist Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Artillerist Emblem, a Runaan's Hurricane, and a Tristana.

prismatic.name: Automata Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Automata Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and a Nocturne.

prismatic.name: Belt Overflow
prismatic.desc: Gain 5 Giant's Belts. Your Giant's Belts grant +60 bonus Health.

prismatic.name: Black Rose Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Black Rose Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Cassiopeia.

prismatic.name: Blazing Soul II
prismatic.desc: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains 45 Ability Power and 35% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every 3 seconds.

prismatic.name: Bronze For Life II
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 3.5% Damage Amp and 1% Durability for each Bronze-tier trait.

prismatic.name: Bruiser Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Redemption, and a Sett.

prismatic.name: Bulky Buddies III
prismatic.desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain 330 Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a 18% max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

prismatic.name: Calculated Enhancement
prismatic.desc: Each combat, 4 random champions in your last two rows gain 40% Attack Damage and 50 Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Conqueror Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Conqueror Emblem, a Last Whisper, and a Rell.

prismatic.name: Coronation
prismatic.desc: Gain a Tactician's Crown. Tactician's Crown, Shield, and Cape grant the holder an additional 25% Attack Speed, 25% Attack Damage, and 35 Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Dominator Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Dominator Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Blitzcrank.

prismatic.name: Enforcer Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Enforcer Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Maddie.

prismatic.name: Expected Unexpectedness
prismatic.desc: Now and at the start of the next 2 stages, roll 3 dice. Gain various rewards based on their total.

prismatic.name: Family Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Family Emblem and a Redemption.

prismatic.name: Final Polish
prismatic.desc: Gain a Support Anvil and a completed item anvil.

prismatic.name: Firelight Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Firelight Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Scar.

prismatic.name: Flurry of Blows
prismatic.desc: Gain a Zeke's Herald. Champions buffed by Zeke's also gain 45% Critical Strike Chance.

prismatic.name: Ghost of Friends Past
prismatic.desc: Whenever an allied champion dies, your current team and all future allies permanently gain 7 health, 1% Attack Damage, or 1 Ability Power, based on the dying champion's role.

prismatic.name: Greater Moonlight
prismatic.desc: Combat Start: 1 random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 4-star for that round and gains 5% Attack Damage and 5 Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Investment Strategy II
prismatic.desc: Gain 5 gold. Your champions gain 9 permanent max health per interest you earn. Your max interest is increased to 7.

prismatic.name: Max Cap
prismatic.desc: Your max level is 7. Gain 1 Tactician's Shield which increases your team size by +1, and 60 gold.

prismatic.name: One Buff, Two Buff
prismatic.desc: Gain a Red Buff, a Blue Buff, and a Champion Duplicator.

prismatic.name: Piercing Lotus II
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 20% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. Critical strikes 20% Shred and Sunder the target for 3 seconds.

prismatic.name: Pit Fighter Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Pit Fighter Emblem, a Sterak's Gage, and a Gangplank.

prismatic.name: Prismatic Pipeline
prismatic.desc: The next non-player combat round will drop an additional Prismatic Orb full of amazing loot.

prismatic.name: Quality Over Quantity
prismatic.desc:
Units holding exactly 1 item upgrade that item to Radiant. Units holding Radiant items gain 4% Health. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

Thief's Gloves counts as multiple items.

prismatic.name: Quickstriker Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Quickstriker Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Nocturne.

prismatic.name: Rebel Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Rebel Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and an Akali.

prismatic.name: Scrap Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Scrap Emblem, a Ziggs, and 2 random components.

prismatic.name: Sentinel Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Sentinel Emblem, a Crownguard, and a Loris.

prismatic.name: Sniper Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Zeri.

prismatic.name: Sorcerer Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and a Vladimir.

prismatic.name: Sponging
prismatic.desc: Combat start: Up to 6 champions with 1 or fewer items gain a copy of a random completed item from the nearest itemized ally.

prismatic.name: Sword Overflow
prismatic.desc: Gain 5 BF Swords. Your BF Swords grant +3% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Tactician's Kitchen
prismatic.desc: Gain a random Emblem. After 3 player combats, gain a Tactician's Cape.

prismatic.name: Tomb Raider II
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 completed item Anvil. Every time a player is eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

prismatic.name: Trait: Geniuses
prismatic.desc:
When Heimerdinger casts, Ekko releases 3 afterimages, each dealing 50% damage. When Ekko casts, Heimerdinger fires 3 missiles, each dealing 150% damage.

Gain a Heimerdinger, Ekko, and a Jeweled Gauntlet.

prismatic.name: Trifecta II
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 3-cost champions. Allies gain 9% Attack Speed. Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 330 Health and 33% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Visionary Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Visionary Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Renata Glasc.

prismatic.name: Void Swarm
prismatic.desc: Gain a Zz'Rot Portal and another after every 10 player combats. Zz'Rot Portal Voidlings gain 40% Attack Speed and 40% Omnivamp.

prismatic.name: Wand Overflow
prismatic.desc: Gain 5 Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +5% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Watcher Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Watcher Emblem, a Steadfast Heart, and a Scar.

prismatic.name: Trait: What Could Have Been
prismatic.desc:
Vander gains 30 permanent max Health each time Silco casts. Silco gains 6 permanent Ability Power each time Vander dies.

Gain a 2-star Vander, a Silco, and a Spear of Shojin.

prismatic.name: A Change Of Fate
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Blue Buff. After starting a round with 60 gold and winning a player combat, gain a Mel and a Hextech Gunblade.

Tasks can be completed in any order.

prismatic.name: Glorious Evolution
prismatic.desc: Gain an Adaptive Helm. After you upgrade 4 champions, gain a Viktor and a Jeweled Gauntlet.

prismatic.name: What You Really Are
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bloodthirster. After you deal 35 damage to other players, gain a Warwick and a Sterak's Gage.

prismatic.name: Experiment Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Experiment Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and an Urgot.
